Title News: All of Tuesday's fixtures and scores
Description: Keep up to date with all the games across the country and the continent...

Title News: Fernandinho set to leave Man City | Pep: I didn't know
Description: Manchester City captain Fernandinho shocked Pep Guardiola by revealing he is not planning to sign a new deal to keep him at the club beyond this season.

Title News: No Lukaku, no problem - Havertz has helped Chelsea move on ahead of Real clash
Description: Romelu Lukaku will miss Chelsea's huge game at Real Madrid - but his struggles plus the blossoming of Kai Havertz mean the Blues may not miss their record signing.

Title News: CL reforms 'Super League via back door', warns fans group
Description: Champions League reform proposals put forward by UEFA amount to a Super League via the back door, according to a Premier League fans' group.

Title News: England captain Leah Williamson and the five-day penalty wait
Description: Leah Williamson will walk out as the new England captain in Belfast, a city that provides her with happy, albeit nerve-wracking, memories.

Title News: Man Utd, Spurs want West Brom's Johnstone
Description: Man Utd and Tottenham will battle it out for the signature of Sam Johnstone in the summer, when the England goalkeeper's West Brom contract ends.

Title News: Godfrey still out to prove people wrong
Description: Evertonâ€™s Ben Godfrey on why proving people wrong has driven him on since being released as a youngster.

Title News: Tuchel on facing Real: No five-sub rule in PL puts us at 'huge disadvantage'
Description: Chelsea head coach Thomas Tuchel says his side will need a "fantastic script" to overturn the 3-1 first-leg deficit at Real Madrid on Tuesday night.

Title News: Papers: PSG in talks to sign Lukaku

Title News: Robber threatened to cut Ashley Cole's fingers off
Description: A robber threatened to cut former England footballer Ashley Cole's fingers off with pliers during a violent break-in at his home, a court has heard.

Title News: Barca highly interested in Lewandowski
Description: Barcelona are highly interested in signing Bayern Munich striker Robert Lewandowski.

Description: A man accused of throwing a bottle at a member of Celtic's backroom staff during the Old Firm clash has appeared in court.

Title News: Lionesses aiming to close in on WC qualification
Description: England Women are aiming to all but confirm their place at next summer's Women's World Cup as they take on Northern Ireland Women at a sold-out Windsor Park on Tuesday.

Title News: Old Firm clash live on Sky Sports as post-split fixtures announced
